statements: UPDATE quantum_experiments SET outcome_result = 'success' WHERE experiment_id = 1;
UPDATE quantum_experiments SET measurement_value = 3.14, experiment_type = 'lab' WHERE experiment_id = 2;
UPDATE quantum_experiments SET measurement_value = 5.67, outcome_result = 'success' WHERE experiment_id = 1
UPDATE quantum_experiments SET outcome_result = 'failure', measurement_value = 3.45 WHERE experiment_type = 'entanglement'
UPDATE QuantumExperimentMeasurements SET measurement_outcome = 'Success' WHERE measurement_id = 1;
UPDATE ExperimentParticipants SET experiment_id = 2 WHERE participant_id = 1;
UPDATE QuantumExperimentMeasurements SET measurement_outcome='Success' WHERE measurement_id=1;
UPDATE ExperimentParticipants SET participant_name='Alice', experiment_id=2 WHERE participant_id=3;
UPDATE Experiment SET researcher_name='John Doe' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE Measurement SET measurement_value=10.5 WHERE id=2;
UPDATE Experiment SET researcher_name = 'John Doe' WHERE experiment_name = 'Sample experiment';
UPDATE Measurement SET measurement_value = 10.5 WHERE experiment_id IN (SELECT id FROM Experiment WHERE researcher_name = 'Jane Smith');
UPDATE quantum_systems SET qubits = 5 WHERE system_id = 1;
UPDATE experiment_results SET measurement_result = 0.987 WHERE result_id = 3;
UPDATE quantum_systems SET gates_used = 'Hadamard, CNOT, Toffoli' WHERE system_name = 'IBM Q System One';
UPDATE quantum_experiments SET quantum_system = 'IBM Q System Two', measurement_outcome = 'Success' WHERE experiment_id = 123;
UPDATE quantum_experiments SET outcome='Success' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE experimental_conditions SET temperature=25, pressure=1.2 WHERE experiment_id=1;
UPDATE quantum_experiments SET start_time = '2022-10-15 08:00:00', outcome = 'Successful Experiment' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE experimental_conditions SET temperature = 25.5, pressure = 1000, humidity = 70 WHERE condition_id = 3;
